select * from film where
title iilike #{title} and
description iilike #{description} and
imageUrl ilike #{imageUrl} and
trailerUrl ilike #{trailerUrl} and
categories && #{categories} and
directors && #{directors} and
casts && #{casts} and
productions && #{productions} and
countries && #{countries} and
(title ilike #{q} or description ilike #{q} or imageUrl ilike #{q} or trailerUrl ilike #{trailerUrl}) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select r.*
, case when u.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from filmrate r
left join filmratereaction u on u.id = r.id and u.author = r.author and u.userId = #{userId}
where
r.id = #{id} and
r.author = #{author} and
r.rate = #{rate} and
r.time >= #{time} and
r.review ilike #{review} and
r.usefulCount >= (#{usefulCount}) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select * from filmratecomment where
commentId = #{commentId} and
id = #{id} and
author = #{author} and
userId = #{userId} and
comment ilike #{comment} and
time >= #{time} and
updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}
